warnings.activeSubscriptionsApiPublic: Exposes subscriptions anonymized to the public.
warnings.allowCommentEditing: Allow users to edit their comments
warnings.askOperators: Warning: changing one or more of the settings may break the page or have other unpredictable consequences. If you are unsure, please try talking to the operators first. If you are sure, feel free to continue.
warnings.expectedRevenueApiPublic: Exposes invoices anonymized to the public.
warnings.guestCommenting: Allow guest visitors (not logged in) to write and publish comments to articles.
warnings.guestCommentRating: Allow guest visitors (not logged in) to rate other people's comments.
warnings.guestPollVote: Allow guest visitors (not logged in) to take a vote in polls.
warnings.invoiceFrequency: The interval in days between invoice reminder attempts.
warnings.invoiceReminders: How many times we will remind user to pay the subscription (once per day).
warnings.loginMinutes: How long (in minutes) the link sent via email to create account will be valid. Defaults to one week (10080 / 60 / 24).
warnings.newDeactivationsApiPublic: Exposes subscriptions anonymized to the public.
warnings.newSubscriptionsApiPublic: Exposes subscriptions anonymized to the public.
warnings.passwordToken: How long (in minutes) the link sent via email to reset password will be valid. Defaults to one day (1440 / 60 / 24).
warnings.peerToken: Timeout in milliseconds after which we will no longer try to pull peer articles. Defaults to 3 seconds.
warnings.renewingSubscriptionsApiPublic: Exposes subscriptions anonymized to the public.
warnings.revenueApiPublic: Exposes invoices anonymized to the public.

deactivation.help: Deactivated subscriptions can still be used until the paid until date. But they will not be automatically renewed even if the auto renew is true. Once deactivated, the subscription cannot be reactivated.

deactivation.willBeDeactivated: The subscription will be deactivated on {{date, ccc PP p}}

memberplanForm.extendableHelpText: Determine whether a user's subscription can be renewed - automatically or manually - or not. As a rule, trial subscriptions cannot be renewed.
memberplanForm.maxCount: Maximum number of subscriptions per user
memberplanForm.maxCountHelpText: Limit the number of subscriptions that a user can purchase for this subscription plan. This also includes deactivated subscriptions.
memberplanForm.trialMemberplanAlert: This subscription plan is configured for trial subscriptions.
memberplanForm.forceAutoRenewNotPossible: Automatic renewal is not possible because the subscription plan is not extendable.
memberplanForm.trialSubscriptionNotPossible: The subscription plan must remain renewable because an automatic renewal is forced in a payment setting. You can of course change this.

subscriptionEditView.trialSubscriptionConfigured: This subscription is configured as a trial subscription.
subscriptionEditView.nonExtendableNotCompatibleWithAutoRenew: An automatically renewing subscription must be renewable. Change one of these parameters.
subscriptionEditView.subscriptionTrialNotPossible: The subscription cannot be configured as a trial subscription. To do so, change the settings of the subscription plan.
